workflow.name: EY - Luissilv - Get Health 8 Cluster ESA
workflow.title: EY - Luissilv - Get Health 8 Cluster ESA

properties.display_name: EY - Luissilv - Get Health 8 Cluster ESA

properties.script:
import telnetlib
import socket

# Resolve ESA's hostname and monitor listern on port 25
hostname = 'esa1.us-demopod1.iphmx.com'
res = socket.gethostbyname(hostname)
port = '25'

try:
    conn = telnetlib.Telnet(res, port, timeout=10)
    response = 'Success'
except:
    response = 'Failed'
finally:
    print(response)
